snippet.title: Motel Manager Simulator - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Add Motel Manager Simulator to your Wishlist:
https://tinyurl.com/MotelSimulatorSteam

Restore an old motel alongside a shop and a gas station. Design, furnish, decorate and rent rooms. provide products for customers and fuel for cars. Hire employees to help you and be the boss of your own empire.

Be the manager of a motel alongside a shop and a gas station. Build, renovate, expand and grow your business to attract more customers. Clean, design and furnish your rooms. Choose styles, color schemes, equipments and decorations to create a unique atmosphere and get the maximum revenue possible. Keep your shop shelves full of products that travellers might need.


#motelmanagersimulator #simulator #management #lifesim

Join Us:
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/denzonegames
DISCORD: https://discord.gg/t2v6caW4Jb
